original_title: Game Player's Gametape for Nintendo Cartridges - Vol. 1, No. 12: Acclaim Games
overview: A video strategy guide tutorial released by Game Player's magazine that covers various Acclaim titles including NARC, Double Dragon II, Total Recall, Swords & Serpents, Ironsword, Bigfoot, Knight Rider, Cybernoid, Destination Earthstar and Arch Rivals
title: Game Player's Gametape for Nintendo Cartridges - Vol. 1, No. 12: Acclaim Games
